title: ISic003611. I.Sicily inscription 003611
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΑΥΤΕ.ΕΙΟΝΧΡΕΣ
2Τ.ΣΚΑΙΑ.ΕΤΟΣ
3Ε.ΕΣΗΤΟΝ
4..ΟΝ.ΗΣΑ[..]
5ΚΟΝΤΑΜ[....]
6.ΜΗΝΑΣΠΕΝΤ.

3: orig.

Apparatus criticus

Text of Rizzone 2008 after SEG

Italian translation

Autecheion, ottimo ed incensurabile, visse anni 40, mesi 5 (Rizzone 2008)

commentary
